akn:subsection.akn:heading: Designation of management entity for program

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Designation of management entity for program The Secretary shall designate prior to February 1, 1981, an appropriate organizational entity within the Department of Energy to manage the methane vehicle research, development, and demonstration program.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Monitoring and management of program; agreements with other Federal departments and agencies

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Monitoring and management of program; agreements with other Federal departments and agencies The Secretary shall have the responsibility for monitoring and assuring proper management of the program. The Secretary may enter into agreements or arrangements with the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, the Department of Transportation, the Environmental Protection Agency, or any other Federal department or agency, pursuant to which such department or agency shall conduct specified parts or aspects of the program as the Secretary deems necessary or appropriate and within the particular competence of such agency, to the extent that such agency has capabilities which would enable it to contribute to the success of the program and attainment of the purposes of this chapter.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Assurances respecting scope of program activities

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Assurances respecting scope of program activities In assuring the effective management of this program, the Secretary shall have specific responsibility to ascertain that the program includes activities to—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Implementation of program; administrative procedures, etc., applicable

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Implementation of program; administrative procedures, etc., applicable
